news.description: Joshua Friedman is representing a class of women truck drivers who were allegedly subject to sexual harassment while working for a company called CRST Expedited. Diane Sawyer discussed this and other incidents of sexual harassment of blue collar women on 20/20.
Bonnie Eskenazi and Sky Moore of Greenberg Glusker have been included in Varietyâ€™s 2018 Legal Impact Report of top attorneys in the entertainment business.
On NBC, Rhonda Hill Wilson discussed the legal hurdles Rapper Meek Mill faces after being released from prison.
